title: Animal Impression
description: Do your best impression of an animal.

title: Send Search History
description: Send a screenshot of your internet search history to the group chat.

title: Cartwheel
description: Attempt to do a cartwheel. Drink if you fail.

title: High School Embarrassment
description: Share your most embarrassing moment in high school.

title: Animal-Noise Call
description: Call the first person in your contacts and have a full conversation using only animal noises.

title: Rock Performance Mime
description: Mime a legendary rock performance without naming the song or band. Group guesses; drink if they can't.

title: Impressing Story
description: Share an embarrassing story about a time you tried to impress someone.

title: Prank Call
description: Make a prank call to someone in your contacts and try to keep them on the line for a full minute.

title: Celebrity Imitation
description: Imitate your favorite celebrity for one minute.

title: Ridiculous Rumor
description: Share the most ridiculous rumor you’ve ever heard about yourself.

title: Cooking Show Pitch
description: Pretend to be a contestant on a cooking show and describe the meal you’re preparing.

title: 10 Push-ups
description: Do 10 push-ups. If you can’t, take a shot.

title: Strangest Nap
description: Reveal the strangest place you’ve ever had a nap.

title: Propose on Left
description: Propose to the person on your left with a ring made from whatever you can find.

title: Send Silly Selfie to Ex
description: Take a selfie with the silliest face possible and send it to your ex.

title: Movie Scene Mime
description: Perform a mime of a popular movie scene. Drink if the group can’t guess it.

title: Describe First Kiss
description: Describe your first kiss without using the words 'mouth' or 'lips.'

title: Alphabet Backward
description: Sing the alphabet backward. If you mess up, take a shot.

title: Tell a Joke
description: Share the funniest joke you know. If no one laughs, drink.

title: Speak in Rhymes
description: Speak in rhymes until your next turn.

title: Name Three Dates
